title: Circle of the Land
content: ntrip Conjuration Action Inflicts Produce Flame A flickering flame appears in your hand. It sheds bright light in a 3m radius and deals 1d8 Fire damage when thrown.Throwing the flame immediately after you conjure it does not cost an action. Extinguishing or throwing it on subsequent turns costs an action Resistance Cantrip Abjuration Action Magically bolster a creature's defenses. It receives a d4 bonus to saving throws. Concentration: Required Range: 1.5m/5ft Shillelagh Cantrip Transmutation Bo
